_header: O orient light shining most bright
Subjects: carols, to Christ; Christ, songs in honour of
_description: James Ryman, ‘O criste rex gencium’ — eight quatrains (aaab) and burden (bb): ‘O criste rex gencium / O vita viuencium’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O orient light shynyng moost brightO sonne of Right adowne thou
                    light…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Of the a sight thou vs behightO vita
                    viuencium
